alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nuckolls and east central Webster Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 538 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cowles, or 28 miles south of Hastings. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Nuckolls and east central Webster Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
